Considering the present state of Indian economy, outline five key agendas for the newly formed Central Government.

Now Indian economy is in a very low growth rate compared with major country's in the world.To boost up our economy there are few agendas should be followed by newly formed government.Mainly from last five years daily commodities prices were increasing continuously so government first agenda is to control the daily commodities(food) prices.It will helps middle and lower class people buying decisions.Government has to help formers to produce more commodities,help in the sense by giving subsidies,crop loans(low interest rate) etc.By doing this our country commodities production can be increase,Slowly our imports percentage would gone down and exports to other countries percentage would be increase.By this Indian economy rises very quikly.

Second agenda is that government has to encourage all industries.Industries like healthcare,pharmaceutical,oil and gas,Food industry etc,in this many of the firms profit is going down.Government has to encourage industries by doing few activities like funding,constructing economic zones,giving support politically etc so that they could motivated and gives fruitful results.

Third agenda is that to combat corruption in India.Mainly in India number of scams,scandals,malpractices and exploitations were increased from past ten years.To combat this evil corruption in India government need to make a comprehensive code of conduct for politicians,legislatures and beaureaucrates.By combating corruption in India we could see India as developed nation in the world.Judiciary should be more independent and initiatives on such rules and issues.Special courts should be set up,take up such issues very quikly with out wasting time.Law and order should be work without interference of politicians.Government has to take necessary rules that bring back black money from world banks present in all over the world to India and use that money for good things and invest in nation development.By this Indian economy can grow up quikly.

Fourth agenda is that government has to enter in to all segments.So that people could afford prices.Because previous governments encouraged lot of privatization and many of the segments were not took charge by the government.Because of this quality work is coming down and even that work also not reaching people.So government has to take necessary charge to look up this and useful segments has to take up by government,it helps low and medium class people.By this government can increase their fund value.Government has to spend more money and ideas on Research and development sectors of all industries so that we could see India is an Innovator nation.

Fifth agenda is that Government has to concentrate on exports.For India there are different ways are there to export our commodities like air,water.road,rail.Government has to improve this ways.By using this improved ways, India has to improve exports.By that Indian economy could grow fastly.India should be improve exports such as Commodities like drugs,pharma products,food,automobiles,different parts,etc so that it helps in economic growth.Government has to help different industries to achieve their growth by that it helps in Indian economic growth.These are the five agendas would helps in Indian economic growth.
